sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect, useRef} from 'react' import Icon1 from '../../images/svg-1.svg'; import Icon2 from '../../images/svg-7.svg'; import Icon3 from '../../images/svg-3.svg'; import {ServicesContainer, ServicesH1,ServicesWrapper, ServicesCard, ServicesIcon, ServicesH2, ServicesP} from './ServicesElements'; import Lottie from 'lottie-web'; const Services = () => { const container = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { Lottie.loadAnimation({ container:container.current, renderer: 'svg', loop: true, autoplay: true, animationData: require('../../cat.json') }) }, []) return ( <> How Swym Works SAVE Download the Swym App and start saving as little as one Satoshi WIN Keep your money saved with Swym for a full week and have a chance to win up to 10 BTC {/*
WIN Keep your money saved with Swym for a full week and have a chance to win up to 10 BTC */} AGAIN Never lose when you always have your savings! Keep saving for a chance to win each week ) } export default Services;
